definition: to be able to withstand/to be able to endure
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished

to rise/to raise/to get up/to set out/to start/to appear/to launch/to initiate (action)/to draft/to establish/to get (from a depot or counter)/verb suffix, to start/starting from (a time, place, price etc)/classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance/classifier for groups: batch, group

sentences.english: Accepted and run, let love stand the fleeting time.
sentences.chinese: 接納與磨合，讓愛經得起流年。

sentences.english: Haba toys are a great choice that will stand the test of time.
sentences.chinese: 哈巴玩具是一個不錯的選擇，經得起時間的考驗。

sentences.english: A name is like a boat which stands the strong wind and striking wave in the sea.
sentences.chinese: 名字的含義是像小船一樣在大海里經得起風吹浪打。

sentences.english: Will your tax statement stand up to detailed examination?
sentences.chinese: 你的有關稅收的報告經得起詳細審查嗎？

sentences.english: I believe it will stand the test of time.
sentences.chinese: 我相信這份報告會經得起時間考驗。

sentences.english: But would such a sleight of hand really stand up to legal scrutiny in the aftermath of Armageddon?
sentences.chinese: 但這種戲法真的經得起末日審判的法律審查嗎？

sentences.english: Practice has proven that the bilateral relations have withstood the tests of time.
sentences.chinese: 實踐證明中塞黑關係是經得起時間考驗的。

sentences.english: A accumulated backbone of a archful of animal hair is able of acknowledging a counterbalancet agnate to that of 99 humans.
sentences.chinese: 滿頭頭髮合在一起的力氣可經得起99個人的分量。

sentences.english: Turth is the daughter of time.
sentences.chinese: 真理經得起時間的考驗。

sentences.english: Her claim can bear close examination.
sentences.chinese: 她的要求經得起仔細檢查。

sentences.english: The packing must be able to withstand rough handling.
sentences.chinese: 包裝必須經得起野蠻搬運。

sentences.english: Its four-dimensional beauty can stand up0 time.
sentences.chinese: 建築的美是四維的，他能經得起時間的磨移。

sentences.english: Children’s furniture must withstand kicks and blows.
sentences.chinese: 孩子用的傢俱必須經得起拳打腳踢。

sentences.english: Metal can bear beating with a hammer, which a stone can't.
sentences.chinese: 金屬能經得起錘子的敲打，但石頭卻不行。

sentences.english: Cars and girls go perfectly well together, it is tested by time.
sentences.chinese: 香車美女的絕配，是經得起時間的考驗的。
世衛組織經得起這一審查。
